value.title: DRDO adding IT, artificial intelligence, robotics in tech warfare: Rajnath
value.excerpt: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh on Tuesday said that the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) is adding new chapters like information technology (IT), artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics in technological warfare.

value.title: A system for designing and training intelligent soft robots
value.excerpt: Let's say you wanted to build the world's best stair-climbing robot. You'd need to optimize for both the brain and the body, perhaps by giving the bot some high-tech legs and feet, coupled with a powerful algorithm to enable the climb.

value.title: We love technology, until it starts loving us back.
